sentences.en: " My! Dat's a mighty gay marvel, I tell you!
sentences.cn: “ 嘿, 老实说, 那是个挺不错的好玩意.

sentences.en: " That's gay -- that's mighty gay , Tom, I tell you. "
sentences.cn: “ 这 真 好玩, 真有意思, 汤姆. ”

sentences.en: "The gay mayor maybe lay in the hay by the Baby bay," he says in dismay.
sentences.cn: 他沮丧地说：“快活的市长大概躺在婴儿湾边上的干草中。

sentences.en: Don't get gay in the presence of so many people.
sentences.cn: 不要在那么多人面前放肆.

sentences.en: Gay broad leaves shone and swung in rhyme.
sentences.cn: 轻盈的宽叶子有节奏地闪烁摇摆.

sentences.en: He has spent money with gay abandon.
I am happy and free, in good health, gay and cheerful.
sentences.cn: 我快活自由，身体健康，积极乐观。
我喜欢色彩鲜艳、让人放松的画。

sentences.en: It was not money that lured the adolescent husbandman to the cities, but the gay life.
sentences.cn: 把那个青年农民引诱到城市的东西不是金钱, 而是那里的欢乐生活.

sentences.en: She felt excited and quite gay.
She leads a gay and wild life.
sentences.cn: 她过着放荡不羁的生活.

sentences.en: Spring comes round to the earth again and everything looks fresh and gay.
The children were gay and cheerful.
The city was gay with all colors of bunting.
sentences.cn: 这个城市到处飘扬着五色缤纷的旗帜.

sentences.en: The conversation is light and gay.
The streets were crammed with gay, laughing crowd.
sentences.cn: 街上挤满了欢乐嬉笑的人群.

trans.tran_cn: 快乐的，愉快的，同性恋的，艳丽的，华丽的，放荡的，无法无天的

trans.tran_en: someone who is homosexual, especially a man
